text: The Okhla NSIC Metro Station is located on the Magenta Line of the Delhi Metro. The station was opened on 25 December 2017. ==History== ===Construction=== ==The station== ===Structure=== Okhla NSIC elevated metro station situated on the Magenta Line of Delhi
